kDesc
With a glossy paint finish and marble counter, this table has class written all over it. [#Legal]
Avec une peinture de finition brillante et comptoir en marbre, ce tableau a de la classe écrit sur elle. [#Legal]
Mit seiner glänzenden Lackierung und der Marmorplatte ist dieser Tisch einfach nur edel. [#Legal]
Con una vernice satinata e uno sportello di marmo, questo tavolo sprigiona classe da ogni lato. [#Legal]
Con ese acabado de pintura brillante y el mármol del tablero, esta mesa lleva escrito "con clase" por todas partes. [#Legal]
With a glossy paint finish and marble counter, this table has class written all over it. [#Legal]

With a glossy paint finish and marble counter, this table has class written all over it. [#Legal]
